age_at_diagnosis: Patient age at time of breast cancer diagnosis (years)
inferred_menopausal_state: Menopausal status inferred from age and clinical records (Pre/Post)
type_of_breast_surgery: Surgical procedure performed (mastectomy vs. breast-conserving surgery)
hormone_therapy: Whether patient received hormone therapy treatment (Yes/No)
radio_therapy: Whether patient received radiation therapy treatment (Yes/No)
cancer_type: Primary cancer diagnosis: Breast Cancer or Breast Sarcoma
cancer_type_detailed: Detailed histological classification: Invasive Ductal Carcinoma, Mixed Ductal and Lobular Carcinoma, Invasive Lobular Carcinoma, Invasive Mixed Mucinous Carcinoma, or Metaplastic Breast Cancer
tumor_other_histologic_subtype: Histologic subtype based on microscopic examination: Ductal/NST, Mixed, Lobular, Tubular/Cribriform, Mucinous, Medullary, Metaplastic, or Other
cellularity: Proportion of tumor cells in the specimen and their spatial arrangement into clusters (assessed post-chemotherapy)
neoplasm_histologic_grade: Tumor grade (1-3) determined by pathological assessment of cell morphology and aggressiveness: Grade 1 (well-differentiated), Grade 2 (moderately differentiated), Grade 3 (poorly differentiated)
tumor_size: Maximum diameter of the primary tumor (millimeters)
tumor_stage: TNM stage grouping indicating extent of cancer spread (Stage 0-IV)
primary_tumor_laterality: Anatomical side of primary tumor: Right or Left breast
lymph_nodes_examined_positive: Number of regional lymph nodes with confirmed metastatic involvement (determined by surgical sampling and pathological examination)
nottingham_prognostic_index: Prognostic score calculated from tumor size, lymph node involvement, and histologic grade; used to estimate survival outcome and guide treatment decisions
oncotree_code: Standardized cancer type code from the OncoTree ontology enabling consistent classification across clinical and research contexts
er_status: Estrogen receptor expression status: Positive (ER+) indicates tumor cells express estrogen receptors and may respond to hormone therapy
er_status_measured_by_ihc: Estrogen receptor status determined by immunohistochemistry (IHC), a pathological staining technique that detects receptor proteins
pr_status: Progesterone receptor expression status: Positive (PR+) indicates tumor cells express progesterone receptors
her2_status: HER2 status: Positive (HER2+) indicates overexpression or amplification, making tumor eligible for targeted therapies
her2_status_measured_by_snp6: HER2 status determined by SNP6 array, detecting gene copy number variations
pam50_+_claudin-low_subtype: Intrinsic molecular subtype based on PAM50 gene expression signature plus Claudin-low classification
3-gene_classifier_subtype: Simplified molecular classification based on ER, HER2, and proliferation index
integrative_cluster: METABRIC integrative cluster (IntClust 1-10): classification system combining copy number alterations, gene expression, and clinical features
overall_survival_months: Time from diagnosis to death or last follow-up (months)
overall_survival: Vital status at last follow-up: Living or Deceased
death_from_cancer: Whether death was attributed to breast cancer
mutation_count: Total number of genes with detected mutations in this patient
patient_id: Unique anonymous identifier for each patient
cohort: Study cohort identifier indicating data collection site or batch
